net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target

Class OneHashPerFileTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target.OneHashPerFileTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionTarget

    public class OneHashPerFileTarget
extends Object
implements ExecutionTarget
    An ExecutionTarget that writes digests to separate files.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julien Nicoulaud

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ExecutionTargetInitializationException
        Initialize the target.

        Should be called before first call to ExecutionTarget.write(String, ChecksumFile, String).

        Specified by:
        init in interface ExecutionTarget
        Throws:
        ExecutionTargetInitializationException - if an error occured while initializing the target.

      • write

        public void write(String digest,
                  ChecksumFile file,
                  String algorithm)
           throws ExecutionTargetWriteException
        Write the hashcode calculated for the given file and algorithm to the target.
        Specified by:
        write in interface ExecutionTarget
        Parameters:
        digest - the digest to write.
        file - the file for which the digest was calculated.
        algorithm - the algorithm used to calculate the digest.
        Throws:
        ExecutionTargetWriteException - if an error occured while writing to the target.

      • close

        public void close(String subPath)
        Close the target.

        Should be called after last call to ExecutionTarget.write(String, ChecksumFile, String).

        Specified by:
        close in interface ExecutionTarget
        Parameters:
        subPath - part of relative path to exclude from file path
